Spade: The Last Assignment
Oliver O
Mbamara bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ,odee na ọka ikpe

AKa ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ndị ọka ikpe na Mahadum Lagos n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ọka ikpe nke Naijiria , ọ rụrụ ọrụ iwu na Naijiria mgbe ọ na-ede edemede na abụ n'otu oge ahụ nlma na-emekwa ihe nkiri na mgbe ọ ọ na-agagharị na Naijeria ya na otu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri a na-akpọ Prime Circle
O mechara kwaga United States ebe ọ gafere n' ule ọkàiwu New York ma mesịa anabata ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu
Ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe iwu nchịkwa na steeti New York ugbu a.
wezuga ọzụzụ ọkachamara ya dị ka onye ọka iwu, Mbamara bụ onye edemede, onye na-ede uri, onye na'ebipụta akwụkwọ, onye nchịkọta akụkọ, onye na -eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi, na ihe ndị ọzọ
Ọ na-aga n'ihu na-enwe mmetụta n'otu oge na ngalaba ndị a dị iche iche
Mbamara bụ onye edemede na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya na mba ụwa yana onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ na ọtụtụ magazin akụkọ mba, akwụkwọ akụkọ, na magazin ịntanetị
Ndị na-ege ya ntị gbasara gburugburu ụwa ma na-agbasa n'etiti agbụrụ, agbụrụ, okike, na ọrụ
A na-egosipụta isiokwu, uri, na nchịkọta akụkọ Mbamara mgbe niile na akwụkwọ akụkọ, magazin, na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ gburugburu ụwa

O nwere opekata mpe akwụkwọ isii bụ: Why Are We Here? 2004, Flame of Love, The Unrestricted, 2004, Flame of Love, The Spark of God, 2002, Love Poems and Quotes, 2003, Poems of Life, 2nd Edition, 2002, na Poems of life, 2001.

N'afọ 2001, afọ ole na ole mgbe ọ bịarutere na United States, Mbamara wepụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ya bụ Poems of Life ma bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri ịgba egwu ya bụ off-Broadway, Prof.Chudis 'Prisoner of the Kalakiri'
N'afọ 2003, Mbamara duziri ma bụrụ onye ndu na ntụrụndụ nke Zulu Sofola's Wedlock of the Gods, na New York
Mbamara na-eme ihe nkiri abụọ: This America na Slave Warrior
Ọ bụ onye edemede nke America a, ebe ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka onye nduzi na onye na-emepụta ihe
Ọ bụkwa onye edemede na onye nduzi nke ihe nkiri Slave Warrior, ihe nkiri akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Afrịka
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a  n'ịtọhapụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ihe mere eme.
Mbamara etinyekwala aka na mmepụta telivishọn ma mepụta, dee, ma duzie Omenala
Ọdịbendị na-achọ nnagide n'etiti ọdịbendị dị iche iche site na iji ọchị egosiputa

N'ime ya, onye isi Africa nke ndị ikwu ya si Africa zitere iji weta nwa ha nwoke Ozobio nwunye onye nọrọ ogologo oge na America n'alọghachighị n'ụlọ, rutere America iji chọpụta na Ozobio na nwanyị America kwere nkwa ọlụlụ
Nnọgidesi ike nke onye isi ahụb esemokwu ọdịbendị na nwanyị America na n'ikpeazụ na nsogbu Ozobio.
